solution_line_template: Since Pogo leaves {pogo_footprints_per_meter} prints per meter, then over {pogo_distance} meters it would leave {pogo_footprints_per_meter}*{pogo_distance}=<<{pogo_footprints_per_meter}*{pogo_distance}={pogo_total_footprints}>>{pogo_total_footprints} footprints on the soils of Mars.

Grimzi leaves {grimzi_footprints_per_6m} prints per {grimzi_distance_per_footprint} feet, or {grimzi_footprints_per_6m}/{grimzi_distance_per_footprint}={grimzi_footprints_per_meter} footprints per meter.

Then over {grimzi_distance} meters, Grimzi leaves {grimzi_footprints_per_meter}*{grimzi_distance}=<<{grimzi_footprints_per_meter}*{grimzi_distance}={grimzi_total_footprints}>>{grimzi_total_footprints} footprints on the sands of Pluto.
In total, the two creatures will leave {pogo_total_footprints}+{grimzi_total_footprints}=<<{pogo_total_footprints}+{grimzi_total_footprints}={total_footprints}>>{total_footprints} footprints.
